=== About me ===
I am from Brazil. Currently working with infrastructure for the Linux platform in the Team Free Workshop, I started my journey on free software and open source BSD across platforms, but today I also use Ubuntu in everyday life because the people, the wonderful community and commitment to the projects. I believe that software should have a joint action of human talent and with that the software can always improve, with this philosophy I hope to contribute, participate and attract new users to Ubuntu and free software universe.
